execution_quality: The agent successfully identified and committed changes, but the subsequent discovery of unrelated modifications suggests incomplete pre-commit validation or awareness of the full change scope.
work_category: Git commit operation for version control. The agent executed a git commit command to save changes to an mcp-server module.
summary: The agent completed the requested git commit but apparently included or failed to surface unrelated changes in the same commit, prompting user follow-up. The core task was executed but with apparent misalignment about what changes were being committed, requiring clarification and investigation in the next iteration.
follow_up_pattern: User requested investigation of unrelated changes found after commit, indicating the agent may have committed more than intended or awareness of scope was incomplete.
